item.title: Blog Post
item.description: Pandas is a Python package that provides fast and flexible data structures. It is well suited for different data types including tabular, ordered and unordered series, arbitrary matrix data, and other statistical data sets. Pandas wrangling acts almost as an equivalent to Râ€™s dplyr. 1. dplyr select = pandas filter 2. dplyr filter = pandas query 3. dplyr arrange = pandas sort_values 4. dplyr rename = pandas rename 5. dplyr group_by = pandas groupby
